item.description:
It's August so it's time for New Haven's Shakespeare in the Park. This year they are doing "The Winter's Tale"

I'll be there Friday August 27th @ 7:30 pm and the play will start at 8:00pm. I'll email my cell phone number to the Yes and Maybe RSVPs in the early/mid afternoon on Friday. Give me a call if you need helping finding the group. I'll have my cell phone on until 8 pm when the play starts.

Bring a blanket, drinks and snacks, bug spray, etc.
...
Performances are free with a suggested donation of: $20 Adult, $10 Student, $5 Children (12 and under)

Feel free to invite anyone you want...the more, the merrier!

The weather looks good but if it rains, I'll reschedule for another night.

Here is a link to a plot synopsis:
http://www.shakespear...


Elm Shakespeare Company website:
http://www.elmshakesp...
item.how_to_find_us: I will email my cell phone to the Yes and Maybe RSVPs on the day of the event.
item.name: Friday 8/27 - Shakespeare at the Park "The Winter's Tale"
